home.title: I'm FullStack Developer
home.body: Hello! I am Nadia Antonella Ruiz, I live in Argentina. I worked on projects using technologies such as React, Express.js, MongoDB and more. My approach is to create solutions that are functional and aesthetically appealing.

about.title: About me
about.body: Passionate about technology and its power to generate a positive impact. I believe that innovation is a link to social, emotional and mental transformation. I am interested in relating soft skills with technical skills.
about.body2: Lover of music (trap, pop and national rock) and vegetarian cuisine, my grounding cable. I love reading books on personal development and discovering new flavors for my dishes, which are both nutritious and protein-rich, to have good performance along with my physical training.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.body: Look at my projects! They are made with a lot of love.

experience.title: Experience
experience.body: These are the technologies I have worked with.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: If you are interested in working with me. Write me!
